summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Housing and Human Services, authorizing an agreement with the City of Bellevue for financial assistance for the provision of employment services to seniors, creating a position, increasing the expenditure allowance in the 1996 budget of the Department of Housing and Human Services, and ratifying and confirming prior acts, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
committee: Health, Housing, Human Services, Education and Libraries
